title: AE40035: Air Transport Management - Quick Facts
text:
AE40035
Course name | Air Transport Management
Offered by | Aerospace Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Historical Development in Air Transportation, Formation of IATA, Traffic Conference Areas, IATA Global Indicators, Geography in World Travel and World Time Zone, International Air Transport Regulations, Air Transport Essentials: Industry codes, OAG Flight Guide and PAT; Major Airlines and Civilian Aircrafts, Airport Essentials, Airfare Construction using concepts of TPM, MPM, EMA, EMS, HIP and NUC; Travel Formalities, Information Technology in Air Travel.
